House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05118
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE COLLECTION OR SOLICITATION OF USAGE FEES FOR TOILETS IN BOTH PUBLIC AND COMMERCIAL PLACES, APPROPRIATING FUNDS AND PROVIDING MECHANISMS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Free Toilet Use Act Of 2017
ABSTRACT : Criminalizes the practice of charging of fees for the use of toilets in order to give access to the public especially the underprivileged and the marginalized.
